                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <div class="PostSummary__body entry-content" data-reactid="797">
               <a data-reactid="798" href="/hive-143575/@oldstone/5fatpe">
                한반도 비핵화와 북한비핵화는 상당한 차이가 있다. 우리는 북한이 비핵화해야 한다고 주장했고 북한은 한반도가 비핵화해야 한다고 주장했다. 우리는 북한의 핵무기를 위협이라고 생각했지만 북한은 미국이 언제든지 핵무기를…

                既然当前正处于DeFi创业黄金机会窗口，那么把握良机的同时恰恰也需要一方入口，可否为大家讲述一下参与DeFi有哪些方式？…

             <div class="articles__content-block articles__content-block--text" data-reactid="1305">
              <h2 class="articles__h2 entry-title" data-reactid="1306">
               <a data-reactid="1307" href="/hive-101145/@tradingideas/sys">
                <span data-reactid="1308">
                 [암호화폐] sys 탈출
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <div class="PostSummary__body entry-content" data-reactid="1309">
               <a data-reactid="1310" href="/hive-101145/@tradingideas/sys">
                2018년에 투자한 후 -90%까지 빠졌던 sys 코인을 장기 보유 하고 있었는데요.      중간에 팔려고 하다가.. 암호화폐 과세 건이 나오면서 계속 보유하고 있기로 결정을 하였습니다. 내년에도 오르지 않으면…
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="articles__footer" data-reactid="1311">
               <div class="articles__summary-footer" data-reactid="1312">

                </span>
               </a>

              <h2 class="articles__h2 entry-title" data-reactid="1564">
               <a data-reactid="1565" href="/hive-101145/@successgr/210320-">
                <span data-reactid="1566">
                 [카카투자] 210320 _ 스톰엑스 존버 중요성을 더 생각하게 만든 코인
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <div class="PostSummary__body entry-content" data-reactid="1567">
               <a data-reactid="1568" href="/hive-101145/@successgr/210320-">
                2018년 불장이후 하락시 하락이 멈추고 다시 상승을 예측했다.  그래서 그때쯤 사놓고 2~3년 물린상태로 방치한 코인이 꽤 된다.     그중에 스톰엑스도 한 녀석이다.  매수 29 , 65 , 73 , 10…
               </a>

              <h2 class="articles__h2 entry-title" data-reactid="1915">
               <a data-reactid="1916" href="/kr-game/@zinasura/28">
                <span data-reactid="1917">
                 영웅전설 제로의 궤적 28화
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <div class="PostSummary__body entry-content" data-reactid="1918">
               <a data-reactid="1919" href="/kr-game/@zinasura/28">
                차오 : 후우... 곤란하게 됐군요. 장로님들께 도움을 청하자니 아무래도 후환이 두렵고... 휴우... [인] 님이 조금만 더 협조적이면 좋을 텐데.  인 : ...계약한 만큼은 확실하게 일하고 있지 않나…

             <div class="articles__content-block articles__content-block--text" data-reactid="2090">
              <h2 class="articles__h2 entry-title" data-reactid="2091">
               <a data-reactid="2092" href="/hive-101145/@new-jersey/452">
                <span data-reactid="2093">
                 +452명
                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <div class="PostSummary__body entry-content" data-reactid="2094">
               <a data-reactid="2095" href="/hive-101145/@new-jersey/452">
                줄어들지 않는 확진자, 오늘도 크게 변동이 없습니다  비가 오니까 기분이 더 우울해지네요   잠시 밖에 바람쐬러 나왔더니, 벗꽃이 조금씩 피기 시작했습니다  점점 봄이 다가오는데, 코로나는 줄어들려고 하지않네요..   오늘도 마스크 꼭꼭!!
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="articles__footer" data-reactid="2096">
               <div class="articles__summary-footer" data-reactid="2097">
                <span class="Voting" data-reactid="2098">
                 <span class="Voting__inner" data-reactid="2099">
                  <span class="Voting__button Voting__button-up" data-reactid="2100">
                   <a data-reactid="2101" href="#" id="upvote_button" title="Upvote">
                    <span class="Icon chevron-up-circle upvote" data-reactid="2102" style="display:inline-block;width:1.12rem;height:1.12rem;">
                     <svg enable-background="new 0 0 33 33" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 33 33" xml:space="preserve" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
                      <g id="Chevron_Up_Circle">
                       <circle cx="16" cy="16" fill="none" r="15" stroke="#121313">
                       </circle>
                       <path d="M16.699,11.293c-0.384-0.38-1.044-0.381-1.429,0l-6.999,6.899c-0.394,0.391-0.394,1.024,0,1.414 c0.395,0.391,1.034,0.391,1.429,0l6.285-6.195l6.285,6.196c0.394,0.391,1.034,0.391,1.429,0c0.394-0.391,0.394-1.024,0-1.414 L16.699,11.293z" fill="#121313">
                       </path>
                      </g>
                     </svg>
                    </span>

3년차.\n\n유튜브 채널 '너와 나의 은퇴 학교'를 통해 다양한 예비 은퇴자를 상담해주고 있다.\n\n이전에 출간한 책으로 &lt;공무원보다 직업 군인이 좋은 33가지 이유&gt;란 책이 있던데, 알고 보니 저자는 33년 동안 군 생활을 했던 직업 군인이었다.\n\n정년 퇴직을 26개월 앞두고, 스스로 명예퇴직을 선택했다.\n\n군대에서 33년을..\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n***\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n진짜 은퇴란,\n\n진짜 은퇴 3대 자산인 경제적 자산, 건강 자산, 심리적 자산의 조화로운 삶을 사는 사람.\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n***\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n은기족 : 은퇴를 기획하는 사람.\n\n파이어(FIRE)족 : Financial(재정), Independence(독립), Retire Early(조기은퇴)\n\n9988234 : 99세까지 팔팔하게 살다가 이삼일만 아프고 죽는 것.\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n***\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n저자가 상담을 하면서 많은 분들에게 은퇴 이후 하고 싶은 일을 물어보면 대부분이 '없다', '여행', '휴식' 셋 중 하나라고 한다.\n\n내가 원하는 것, 내가 좋아하는 것을 찾는게 참 어렵다.\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n***\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n&gt;직장생활 동안 잘 나가고 못나가고는 중요하지 않아.\n&gt;\n&gt;결국 퇴직 이후 누가 돈 걱정 없이 살 수 있느냐, 이게 가장 중요한 거 아닐까?\n\n승승장구하며 임원까지 지낸 후 퇴직한 어느 60대가 한 말이다.\n\n임원 시절의 풍족한 생활을 더이상 할 수 없는 상황에서, 아내의 소비성향이 바뀌지 않아 국민연금만으로는 버티기 힘든 상황에 빠진 케이스이다.\n\n부부 둘 중 하나라도 경제 관념이 없다면 참 곤란할 것 같다.\n\n연애할 때는 사실 이런거 고려하지 못하고 결혼하는 경우가 대부분일 것이다.\n\n정말 부부의 연은 복불복이 아닐까.\n\n우리 부부는 이런 면에서 잘 맞아서 다행이다.\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n​&lt;br&gt;\n\n#### 아래부터는 책을 읽으며 기록해 둔 본문의 문장들.\n\nhttps://i.imgur.com/HckzDOK.gif\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n성공한 인생에 정답은 없지만, 결국 노후가 행복하다면 성공한 인생이 아닌가?\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n***\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n모든 직장인에게 퇴직은 시간의 문제일 뿐이다.\n\n남보다 조금 빠를 수도, 늦을 수도 있다.\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n***\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n퇴직을 하면 만나게 될 인생 이모작 유형은 딱 세 가지.\n\n이직 : 자신이 하던 분야의 유사 업종에 재취업\n\n전직 : 전혀 새로운 업종으로 전환\n\n창직 : 과거의 경험을 활용하여 새로운 직업을 만들거나, 취미를 활용하여 새로운 업종을 만드는 것\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n***\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n전반기 인생은 내가 원하는 삶이 아닌, 그냥 살아가기 위한 삶이였다.\n\n은퇴 이후의 삶은 꼭 진짜 은퇴 3대 자산(돈, 건강, 가족/인간관계)의 조화를 이루는 삶이 되어야 한다.\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n***\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n우리의 노후 자금은 보통 세 가지 위험에 노출되어 있다.\n\n유동성, 금리, 장수 위험이다.\n\n은퇴자들의 자산 대부분은 아파트 한 채가 전부다.\n\n### 은퇴 준비는 자산 중심에서 소득 중심으로 변경해야 한다.\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n***\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n가능하면 퇴직 전에 소득에 구애받지 말고 다양한 소득 경험을 많이 해보길 추천한다.\n\n다른 생각할 여유없이 직장에 '올인'하다가 퇴직했다는 분들 많이 만났다.\n\n### 모든 직장인들에게 퇴직은 숙명이고, 은퇴 이후의 새로운 삶은 필수다.\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n***\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n정년 퇴직 후 경제적 독립 준비가 안 되어 방황하는 사람들을 많이 만났다.\n\n대부분 열심히 저축하고 산 것이 잘못은 아니지 않은가 항변한다.\n\n분명히 말하지만 그것은 잘못이다. 명백한 잘못이다.\n\n빌게이츠는 이렇게 말했다. '가난하게 태어난 것은 당신의 잘못이 아니지만, 죽을 때 가난하게 죽는 것은 당신의 잘못이다.'\n\n똑같이 입사해서 동일한 월급을 받았는데, 서로 다른 은퇴 성적표를 받았다면 그 결과는 명백히 당신의 잘못이다.\n\n### 은퇴가 돈만의 문제는 아니지만, 경제적 독립이 안되면 다른 것은 아예 생각할 수도 없다.\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n***\n\n&lt;br&gt;\n\n정년 퇴직을 준비하면서 멋진 차, 그림 같은 집을 장만했지만 건강 관리가 안되면 목적지가 병원이 된다.\n\n우리가 그토록 열심히 돈을 버는 이유가 병원비를 준비하기 위함은 아닐 것이다.\n\n### 은퇴 후 돈은 중요하지만, 건강은 소중하다.\n&lt;br&gt;\n***\n\n2021.03.20.","community_title":"SCT.암호화폐.Crypto","max_accepted_payout":"1000000.000 SBD","beneficiaries":[],"depth":0,"promoted":"0.000 SBD","author_title":"","net_rshares":125249625679008,"json_metadata":{"tags":["hive-101145","sct-kr","sct-freeboard","mini","zzan","kr","liv","dblog","sct"],"image":["https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTvjr5NyLq7RwERCCk9cW7vCAfWQJPQM8qnWGaDPvYY3j/Screenshot_20210320-130138_Naver%20Blog.jpg","https://i.imgur.com/HckzDOK.gif"],"app":"steemcoinpan/0.1","format":"markdown","canonical_url":"https://www.steemcoinpan.com/@lucky2015/78zpq6"},"payout":132.556,"replies":[],"created":"2021-03-20T08:02:15","community":"hive-101145","percent_steem_dollars":10000,"author_role":"guest","permlink":"78zpq6","author":"lucky2015","payout_at":"2021-03-27T08:02:15","author_payout_value":"0.000 SBD","is_paidout":false,"author_reputation":78.01,"url":"/hive-101145/@lucky2015/78zpq6","active_votes":null,"blacklists":[],"title":"[독서일기] 진짜 은퇴 가짜 은퇴","post_id":89925414,"updated":"2021-03-20T08:02:15","category":"hive-101145","stats":{"hide":false,"gray":false,"total_votes":181,"flag_weight":0},"children":5},"zinasura/28":{"pending_payout_value":"178.288 SBD","curator_payout_value":"0.000 SBD","body":"![3.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcEQjtRUSHfLWV4iRuoA9Gm3KvbteMJX3wyLsBVYq9umC/3.jpg)\n\n차오 : 후우... 곤란하게 됐군요. 장로님들께 도움을 청하자니 아무래도 후환이 두렵고... 휴우... [특무지원과] 를 어떻게 느꼈나?\n차오 : 흠... 용건이란 건 그들에 대한 것이었군요. 글쎄요ㅡ 흥미로운 젊은이들이더군요. 특히 리더 격인 로이드 씨가 좋았습니다. 본인의 능력 부족을 통감하면서도 앞만 보고 나아가고자 하는... 감도 나쁘지 않은 것 같고 제법 마음에 드는 타입입니다.\n인 : 네 취향은 안 물었다. 다른 멤버는 어때?\n차오 : 후후, 그게 또 얼마나 흥미로운 면면들인지. 맥도웰 시장님의 손녀분... 상당한 정치 감각의 소유자라 참모 역할이라 해도 좋을 것입니다. 엡스타인 재단의 꼬마 아가씨... 마도 지팡이 자체도 흥미롭지만 특수한 자질을 지닌 듯합니다. 그리고 붉은 머리의 그 남자는... 후후, 이건 제 감입니다만 우리와 같은 부류가 아닐까 싶군요.\n인 : ...그렇군...\n차오 : 그나저나... 왜 또 그들에게 흥미를?\n인 : 그냥... 시험해 보고 싶어서 말이야. 나의 ㅡ[인] 의 의뢰를 맡을 자격이 있는 상대인지를.\n\n![5.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZpdvh7w6HQBXirpH2aFNkMaQvc1JEds5EF3e6FXx6nNE/5.jpg)\n\n[특무지원과]\n엘리 : ㅡ하지만 그건 이상해. 이번에 1과가 나타난 건 어디까지나 결과에 지나지 않아. 리샤 씨가 눈치 있게 우리한테 부탁하지 않았다면 드러나지도 않았을 테고.\n로이드 : 으음, 하긴... 그렇다면 1과의 눈을 속일 양동 작전은 아니었겠네... 애초에 [인] 의 존재를 알고 있는 사람은 누굴까?\n엘리 : 글쎄... 고용주인 [헤이유에] 는 당연히 알 테고. 대립 중인 [르바체] 와 동향을 쫓고 있는 수사1과... 그리고 르바체와 관계가 있는 하르트만 의장도 알고 있겠네.\n로이드 : 하르트만 의장이라면... 어제도 얘기한?\n엘리 : 응, 제국파의 리더로 의회를 주름잡는 거물 정치가야. 르바체 최대의 후원자라고 할 수 있는 존재지. 참고로 할아버님의 개혁안은 거의 모두 이 사람 때문에 실패했어.\n로이드 : 그랬구나... 이름 정도밖에 몰랐는데. 그렇다면 [인] 입장에서는 반대로 적대 세력이 되는 건가?\n엘리 : 응... 관계는 적을 거야.\n랜디&티오 : ......\n로이드 : 티오, 랜디?\n엘리 : 왜 그래? 넋이 나간 표정을 하고.\n랜디 : 아니... 그거야, 뭐.\n티오 : 엘리 씨... 오늘은 아주 활기가 넘치네요?\n엘리 : 아, 응... ㅡ미안해. 어제는 나 때문에 놀랐지. 하지만 이제 괜찮아. 짐이 되진 않을게.\n로이드 : 그러니까 엘리... 짐이란 소리 하지 말라니까. 오히려 우리가 엘리한테 많은 도움을 받고 있다고. 지금도 봐, 엘리가 있으니까 추리도 이렇게 순조로운걸.\n엘리 : 그, 그런가...\n랜디 : ...수상해.\n티오 : ...수상합니다.\n\n![2.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmX1UxiXawHTFBJDV9ofjW4XHkGGdKqkRAPLvJtQAnFGKm/2.jpg)\n\n로이드 : 앗...\n엘리 : 저, 저기...\n랜디 : 그러고 보니 어젯밤... 옥상에서 이야기 소리가 들리던데. 혹시...\n티오 : ...과연, 그렇군요. 축하합니다. 로이드 씨, 엘리 씨.\n로이드 : 아, 아니. 딱히 축하받을 만한 행동은 안 했는데?\n엘리 : 마, 맞아... 그, 그저 잠깐 여러 이야기를 나눴을 뿐인데...\n랜디 : 오호, 여러 이야기라. ㅡ그래서, 어디까지 갔는데?\n로이드 : 랜디!\n엘리 : 자, 잠깐! 티오도 있는데...\n티오 : 어디까지 갔나... 아아, 교제 과정에서 여러 단계를 밟는다는ㅡ\n로이드 : 아니, 그런 거 아니거든!\n랜디 : 휘~ 휘~\n티오 : ...휘~ 휘~\n엘리 : 적.당.히.들. 하.시.죠.\n랜디 : 옙...\n로이드 : 나 참... 나와 엘리의 관계를 의심하다니, 그런 건 있을 수가 없잖아?\n엘리 : ...앗...\n로이드 : 애초에 어울리지도 않을 뿐더러 그런 분위기가 될 일도 없고... 그렇지, 엘리?\n엘리 : ......\n로이드 : ...어라.\n랜디 : (어이, 어이...)\n티오 : (지뢰 밟았네요...)\n엘리 : ...그래, 그렇겠지... 그냥 얘기나 하면서 재미도 없는 하소연이나 들어 줬을 뿐이지... 그럼, 그런 달콤한 분위기는 단연코 아니었지!\n로이드 : ...저, 저기... 그러니까 어울리지 않는다는 건 내가 엘리에게 어울리는 상대가 아니라는 얘기일 뿐이고...\n엘리 : 찌릿...\n로이드 : ...죄송합니다.\n\n![1.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdxujMc14hm3H2AtGhtKsubpP8agTyLcBGoBe3HXyKAtR/1.jpg)\n\n랜디 : 큭큭큭... 그 뭐냐. 기운을 차린 것 같으니 다행이네.\n엘리 : 아...\n티오 : ...안심이 되네요. 혹시 경찰을... 그만두는 게 아닌가 했거든요...\n엘리 : ...미안해, 걱정 끼쳐서. 나중에 어떻게 할지는 아직 모르겠지만... 지금 내가 있어야 할 곳이 여기라는 건 틀림없으니까. 그러니까 다들... 다시 한번 잘 부탁해.\n로이드 : 엘리...\n티오 : ...엘리 씨.\n랜디 : 하하, 아가씨의 태클이 없으면 역시 긴장감이 떨어진다니까.\n엘리 : 태클을 걸게 만드는 건 너희잖아... ㅡ뭐, 그건 그렇고. 수사 방침 말인데 결국 어떻게 하면 될까?\n로이드 : 음, 그럼...\n티오 : 1과와는 다른 접근 방식으로 [인] 에게 다가가려고 해도... 루트가 여럿이라 오히려 결정을 못 하겠네요.\n랜디 : 그렇다면, 이거다. 칼바드의 동방인 거리에 출장을 가는 건 어때? [인] 의 단서를 조금은 찾을 수 있지 않을까?\n로이드 : 그, 그건 생각을 못 했네.\n엘리 : 하지만 외국 출장이라니, 허가가 떨어질까? 지원과의 범주에서 벗어날 것 같기도 하고...\n티오 : ......\n로이드 : 티오...?\n엘리 : 왜 그래?\n티오 : 경찰의 데이터베이스를 조금만 더 훑어볼까 하고요. 1과의 동향 등을 파악할 수 있을지도 모르고... 다만, 어제도 조사했기 때문에 추가 정보는 없을 수도 있습니다.\n로이드 : 그렇군...\n랜디 : 뭐, 안 하는 것보단 나으니까.\n티오 : 아...\n로이드 : 왜 그래?\n티오 : ...드문 일이네요... 도력 메일이 와 있는 것 같습니다.\n\n![4.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYJnpf6wB4ZYR6Sh61WetNo1EhPYAEJqthQFks5AsZVHc/4.jpg)\n\n로이드 : 도력 메일?\n엘리 : 문장만으로 이루어진 정보를 단말기로 보내는 기능이었던가?\n티오 : 네, 아주 편리한데 경찰에서는 사용하는 사람이 거의 없나 보더라고요... 키보드를 사용할 수 있는 사람이 아직 적어서 그런가 봅니다.\n로이드 : 아아... 하긴 나도 못 쓰니까.\n랜디 : 그건 그렇고 누가 보낸 건데?\n티오 : 지금 열어 볼게요... 어...\n로이드 : 뭐야...?\n엘리 : 대체 누가ㅡ!?\n&gt;[인] 으로부터의 지원 요청. 시련을 극복하고 내게로 올지어다. 그리하면 그대들에게 사명을 내릴지니.\n\n로이드 : 이, 이건...!\n랜디 : 이봐... 이건 또 무슨 장난이냐!?\n엘리 : 티오... 이 메일은 어디서 온 거야!?\n티오 : 경찰 본부는 아니네요... 알았습니다. [크로스벨 국제은행] ㅡ통칭 IBC입니다.\n로이드 : ...어떻게 된 거지...?\n랜디 : IBC 라면 온 대륙에서 미라를 긁어 모으는 은행이잖아? 왜 그런 곳에서 이런 장난을 치는 거야?\n티오 : 저한테 물어보셔도 잘... 하지만 이 메일은 틀림없이 IBC의 단말기에서 보낸 겁니다. 누가 보낸 것인가까지는 모르지만.\n로이드 : 혹시 [인] 이 IBC에 잠입한 건가...?\n엘리 : 솔직히 가능성이 없지는 않아. 게다가 IBC 건물에는 외부 회사도 몇 곳이 입주해 있거든. 아마... 엡스타인 재단의 사무소도 있지 않았나?\n티오 : 네... 아는 사람이 거기서 근무합니다. 하지만... 아무래도 이 메일은 IBC의 메인 단말기에서 발신된 것 같아요. 외부 회사가 관련되어 있을 가능성은 낮을 것 같은데...\n로이드 : ...직접 물어보는 수밖에 없나. 가급적 1과에는 알려지지 않도록 수사를 진행하고 싶었지만...\n\n![6.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRX2jqnQXufqt88956c3enadTAYBp28a8TR1LU6gW4THJ/6.jpg)\n\n랜디 : 이런 상황에서 신분을 밝히지 않고 물어보기는 힘들겠네. 뭐, 쓸데없는 간섭이 들어오기 전에 움직여 버리면 그만 아니겠냐?\n엘리 : ...어쩌면 몰래 알아볼 수 있을지도 몰라.\n로이드 : 앗...\n티오 : 어떻게요...?\n엘리 : ...내 친구 중에 IBC 관계자가 있어. 그 사람의 아버님께 사정을 얘기하면 힘이 되어 주실지도 몰라.\n로이드 : 그랬구나...\n랜디 : 오오, 마침 잘됐는데? 역시 아가씨야. 연줄도 다양하네.\n엘리 : 뭐, 그럭저럭. 하지만 아주 바쁜 분이라 크로스벨시에 계실지 모르겠네...\n티오 : 어떤 입장에 있는 분인가요?\n엘리 : ...아마 알고 있겠지만, 디터 크로이스라는 분이야.\n로이드 : 뭐!?\n티오 : 아...\n랜디 : 뭐야, 유명인이냐?\n로이드 : 아, 응... 어떻게 보면 지명도로는 일리야 씨 정도 될지도 몰라.\n티오 : 디터 크로이스... 대륙 유수의 자산가로서 국제 경제의 중심 인물 중 하나... 현 IBC 총재죠.\n랜디 : 오오, 은행의 수장이냐!?\n엘리 : 원래 아버님의 오랜 벗이었어. 할아버님과도 옛날부터 친교가 있어서 쭉 친분을 쌓았지... 그 따님은 나와 소꿉친구였어.\n로이드 : 그랬구나... 하지만 그런 분이라면... 자리에 안 계셔도 어쩔 수 없겠네.\n엘리 : 응... 1년의 절반 정도는 외국에 나가 계신다고 하니까. 하지만 한번 해 봐야지. 그래도 내 친구는 있을 수도 있으니까 일단 가 보기는 하자.\n로이드 : 그래, 좋아. 하지만 이걸로 수사 방향은 잡혔지만...\n티오 : ...메일의 의도가 문제네요. 협박장도 그랬지만 무슨 생각인 걸까요?\n랜디 : 뭐, 그쪽에서 먼저 우리한테 접촉해 왔잖아. 여기선 덥석 물어 줘야지.\n엘리 : 그래... 가자, IBC 빌딩으로.\n\n![7.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcF2GDGNtU9LngmrwubA1UcYRvdNs1jQpuKC34VdAquZe/7.jpg)\n\n랜디 : IBC 빌딩이라... 몇 번을 봐도 엄청난 빌딩이군.\n로이드 : 이렇게 보니... 10층 이상은 충분히 되겠어.\n엘리 : 아마 16층 건물이었을 거야. 그중 5층에서 10층까지는 외부 회사가 입주해 있대.\n로이드 : 그렇구나...\n티오 : 크로스벨시의 세수에 상당 부분 기여하고 있을 것 같네요.\n로이드 : 그나저나 어떻게 할 거야? 사전에 약속도 안 잡고 와 버렸는데...\n엘리 : 그러네, 일단은 안쪽 접수처에서 물어보자.\n비서 어니스트 : 엘리...?\n엘리 : 어니스트 씨...\n비서 어니스트 : 별 우연도 다 있군... 이런 곳에서 만나다니. 다 함께 있는 걸 보니 경찰 일 때문에 온 거야?\n엘리 : 네... 조금 알아볼 게 있어서요. 어니스트 씨는 할아버님 일 때문에 오셨나요?\n비서 어니스트 : 응, 사무소 운영 자금 관리에 대해 상담을 받느라. 다음 달부터 바빠질 거라 자금 운영이 쉽지 않아서 말이야.\n엘리 : ...그렇군요\n비서 어니스트 : 그래서, 엘리... 조금 생각해 봤니?\n엘리 : ...네. 역시 지금 경찰을 그만둘 수는 없어요. 저는 아직 아무것도 잡지 못했죠... 적어도 그 뭔가가 잡힐 때까지는 아직 반쪽짜리라는 생각이 들어서요. 도리어 할아버님께 짐이 되고 말 거에요.\n비서 어니스트 : 하지만... 네가 추구하는 게 정말 그 길 끝에 있는 걸까? 어쩌면 그건 그저 신기루일지도 모르잖아?\n엘리 : 그럴 수도 있겠죠. 하지만 2달 동안... 많은 것을 볼 수 있게 됐어요. 문제를 하나하나 해결해 나가면서 조금씩 성장한 것도 실감이 나고요. 아마 그대로 사무소로 들어가서 할아버님의 비서 중 한 명이 되었다면 얻을 수 없었을 귀중한 경험이에요.\n\n![9.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmV7bFhTSHiJydnwgZuXM4FANSizH21pKKEFLSdjTajxL5/9.jpg)\n\n비서 어니스트 : ......\n엘리 : ...그러니까, 죄송해요. 적어도 제 몫을 다하게 될 때까지는... 지금의 위치에서 열심히 해 보려고 해요.\n비서 어니스트 : 후우... 보아하니 망설임이 사라진 것 같네.\n엘리 : 앗...\n비서 어니스트 : 알겠다, 이제 아무 말 않으마. 후우, 모처럼 사무소에 유능한 후배가 들어오나 했는데. 내 기대가 어긋나고 말았네.\n엘리 : 어니스트 씨...\n비서 어니스트 : 아, 그렇지만... 다음 달에 있을 창립기념제 때는 식전에 꼭 참석해 다오. 본래라며 너의 어머님께 부탁드리고 싶었지만... 아무래도 시장님의 가족이 한 명도 참석하지 않는 건 서글프니까.\n엘리 : ...그렇게 할게요. 어니스트 씨, 여러모로 감사합니다.\n비서 어니스트 : 하하, 뭐 너의 선생님이기도 했으니까. 이 정도 잔소리는 하게 해 줘. 앗, 이런 곳에서 시간을 빼앗았네. 너희들도 일 열심히 해. 그리고... 엘리 아가씨를 잘 부탁해.\n로이드 : ...네.\n엘리 : ......\n로이드 : 엘리를 무척이나 생각해 주시는 분 같네. 선생님이었다고 하던데...\n엘리 : 으응... 내가 어렸을 때 가정 교사였거든. 유학을 떠난 뒤에는 조금 소원해졌지만.\n티오 : ...본인도 정치가가 되려는 거 맞죠?\n엘리 : 응, 내년 의원 선거에 신인으로 출마할 건가 봐. 제국파와 공화국파, 그 어느 쪽에도 소속되지 않을 거라고 하니까 무척 고생하겠지만...\n랜디 : 정치가 지망생인가. 근데 정치가의 비서치고는 몸이 꽤 좋던데. 무슨 무술이라도 하나?\n\n![10.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQxA4aR3ELZY7oAfYHhwALNjrxsNcR2eRDSQNwivxobfk/10.jpg)\n\n엘리 : 아마 검술 경험이 있을 거야. 실력도 상당해서 할아버님의 호위를 겸하고 있다고 들었는데...\n로이드 : 아아... 그래서 그렇게 체격이 좋은 거구나.\n그레이스 : 어머나? 이야~ 오랜만이네. 지난달의 마수 소동 건... 잘 읽었어. 그래, 그래. 열심히들 하고 있나 보네.\n로이드 : 그레이스 씨...\n엘리 : 그러고 보니 그 기사는 그레이스 씨가 쓰신 게 아니죠?\n그레이스 : 응, 취재가 있어서 크로스벨을 떠나 있었거든. 가능하면 너희들 취재는 내가 맡고 싶었는데~\n티오 : ...결과적으로는 정답이었네요.\n랜디 : 뭐, 항상 그런 식이라면 우리도 의욕이 안 생긴다고요.\n그레이스 : 아이, 뭐야. 너희들의 성장을 지켜보는 나의 깊은 애정을 모르다니~ 그건 그렇고... IBC에 볼일 있어? 다 함께 있는 걸 보니까 수사라도 하러 온 건가?\n로이드 : 아, 아뇨, 딱히... 별일 아닙니다.\n엘리 : 네, 그냥 뭘 좀 물어보려고 왔을 뿐이에요.\n그레이스 : 흐음... 뭐, 그래. 나도 바쁘니까 이 자리는 못 본 척해 줄게. 그럼 또 봐~!\n랜디 : 나 참, 여전히 마이 페이스인 누님이라니까~\n티오 : 하지만 그레이스 씨치고는 순순히 물러났네요... 그렇게 바쁜 걸까요?\n엘리 : 뭐, 기념제 전이니까 취재할 게 많겠지.\n로이드 : 으음, 웬만하면 우리 쪽 기사도 포기해 주면 좋을 텐데... 뭐, 그건 그거고... 이제 건물로 들어가 보자. 총재님과 면회할 수 있는지 접수처에 물어봐야지.\n엘리 : 응, #3. Tried testing Play Steemit Moblie App! (21/03/2021)","post_id":89933650,"updated":"2021-03-20T21:35:42","category":"hive-101145","stats":{"hide":false,"gray":false,"total_votes":346,"flag_weight":0},"children":0},"tronfoundation/announcement-on-the-upcoming-release-of-great-voyage-v4-1-3-thales":{"pending_payout_value":"0.000 SBD","curator_payout_value":"23.730 SBD","body":"![Announcement.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUbNh7CsGxFsM8xHMgMAei4MDgLSFSgEDNWbssBRQbtMi/Announcement.jpg)\n\n\n\nWe plan to release Great Voyage - v4.1.3(Thales) in one week, this version is a non-mandatory upgrade, You can decide whether to upgrade to the new version according to your needs.\n\nGreatVoyage-4.1.3(Thales)  is released with the following new features and modifications:\n# 1.Core Protocol\n- **Optimize the structure of account storage to improve the transaction execution speed and packing speed**\nthe account data needs to be read frequently during transaction execution, which involves serialization and deserialization of account. However, in addition to some necessary fields (balance, account name, etc.) in the account, there are many Asset-related fields that are not Commonly used, stripping them out can greatly increase the speed of serialization and deserialization.\n    \n    This time, move the “Asset” related fields in the account storage structure to independent storage, which improves the speed of serializing and deserializing accounts during transaction execution, thereby increasing the processing speed of transactions.\n   \n   Compared with GreatVoyage-4.1.2, through testing, after this optimization, the transaction execution speed increased by 23.26%, and the block processing speed increased by 33.91%.\n\n- **Sorting the transactions in pending pool,  SR will prioritize the transactions with high packing fee**\nIn GreatVoyage-4.1.2 and earlier versions, SR packaging transactions are carried out in accordance with the time sequence of the arrival of the transaction.This will easily be attacked by low transaction fees.\n   \n   After this optimization, block producers sort the transactions to be packaged according to the cost, and then prioritize the transaction with high cost to prevent low-cost transaction attacks.\n\n\n# 2.API\n- **Add new API to support transaction query in pending pool.**\nIt is currently impossible to query the intermediate state information of a certain transaction from after it is issued to before it is on the chain.After a transaction is sent, if it is not on the chain, we cannot know whether it is waiting for packaging or has been discarded.\n   \n  In this upgrade, the Fullnode node provides 3 API to obtain detailed information about the pending pool:\n    - **/wallet/gettransactionfrompending**\n       Obtain the transaction information from pending pool through the transaction ID\n    - **/wallet/gettransactionlistfrompending** \n    Get all transactions from the pending pool\n    - **/wallet/getpendingsize** \n    Get the number of transactions in pending pool\n\n\nThe account optimization of Great Voyage-v4.1.3 (Thales) will further improve the performance of the TRON public chain, the optimization of transaction packaging logic will effectively reduce low-cost attacks and greatly improve the security of the TRON public chain.\n\n\n--- SBD","curator_payout_value":"0.000 SBD","body":"한반도 비핵화와 북한비핵화는 상당한 차이가 있다. 우리는 북한이 비핵화해야 한다고 주장했고 북한은 한반도가 비핵화해야 한다고 주장했다. 우리는 북한의 핵무기를 위협이라고 생각했지만 북한은 미국이 언제든지 핵무기를 한반도에 들여올 수 있다고 생각했기 때문이다.\n\n한반도에서 미국이 핵무기를 빼내간 것은 미러간 중거리핵무기 금지협정 때문이었다. 냉전이 종식되면서 미국과 러시아는 세계적인 핵무기 위협을 낮추기 위해서 중거리 핵무기 금지협정을 체결했다. 상호 신뢰의 의미와 함께 미국은 러시아의 핵무기가 유럽을 노리고 있는 상황을 개선하고자 했다. 중거리 핵무기 금지 협정으로 가장 이익을 본 측은 미국과 유럽이었다. 물론 러시아도 유럽과 한국에 중거리 핵무기를 배치하고 있던 미국의 중거리 핵무기로부터 자유로워졌다. 그러나 유럽이 느끼던 중압감의 해방과는 비교하기 어려웠다.\n\n갑자기 2018년 미국이 중거리핵무기 금지협정을 일방적으로 폐기했다. 미국의 중거리핵무기 금지협정 폐기가 몰고 올 파장에 대해서는 여러 지면에서 소개한 적이 있었다.\n\n미국은 중국을 견제하기 위해 중거리 핵무기가 필요했고 예상되는 배치지역이 한국과 필리핀 일본 등지가 될 것이라고 추정한바 있었다.\n\n미국은 중거리 핵무기를 배치하기 위해 한반도의 핵위협을 더욱 악화시킬 가능성이 있다고도 했다. 미북간 핵무기를 둘러싼 협상과 합의도 파국으로 다다를 가능성이 높다고 보았다.\n\n한반도 지역에서 미국이 중국과 패권경쟁을 위해 취할 수 있는 방법은 두가지가 있다. 첫번째는 북한을 포용해서 중국을 견제하는 것. 두번째는 남북관계를 적대적으로 만들고 북한이 핵위협을 극대화하도록 해서 남한에 미국의 중거리 핵무기를 배치하고 이를 바탕으로 중국을 직접 견제하는 것이다.\n\n미국은 첫번째 방법은 포기한 것 같다. 두번째 방안으로 접어들었다. 미국이 한반도 비핵화가 아니라 북한비핵화를 주장하는 이유다.\n\n문제의 본질을 보지 못한 언론에서는 왜 문재인정부가 북한비핵화가 아닌 한반도 비핵화를 주장하는가에 주목하고 있다. 문재인 정부가 마친 친북적인 성향을 지닌 것 처럼 국민들에게 비치게 하려고 한다.\n\n미국이 그동안 북한과의 협상에서 써오던 표현인 한반도 비핵화가 아닌 북한 비핵화를 주장한 것은 다시 남한에 핵무기를 가져다 놓겠다는 의지가 숨겨져 있는 것이다. 우리 정부의 협상당사자들도 미국의 의도를 파악하고 공동선언문에 포함시키지 않을 것이라고 생각한다.\n\n미국이 그렇게 나오면 우리 정부가 아무리 버틴다고 해도 별로 방법이 마땅하지 않다. 특히 국민을 제대로 통합하지 못한 문재인 정부가 미국의 압력에 버티기는 쉽지 않을 것이다.\n\n결국 한반도는 다시 1990년 이전의 상황으로 돌아간다. 북한의 핵문제는 전혀 새로운 방향으로 접어들게 될 것이다. 미국은 남한에 핵무기를 배치해야 하기 때문에 북한의 핵무기를 인정하는 수 밖에 없을 것이다.\n\n진정한 남북관계의 발전은 그 이후에야 가능할지도 모르겠다. 문재인 정권은 이런 상황에서 벗어날 수 있는 짧은 기회를 가지고 있었으나 이를 놓치고 말았다.\n\n남한에 핵무기를 배치하면 중국은 남한과 관계를 어떻게 가져갈 것인가?\n\n우리 정권은 미국에게 어떤 반대급부를 요구하여 중국과의 경제단절로 인한 손해를 벌충할 수 있을 것인가 ?","community_title":"Agora 한국정치와 국제정치 문제","max_accepted_payout":"1000000.000 SBD","author_title":"","net_rshares":300329170449184,"json_metadata":{"tags":["kr-security"],"app":"steemit/0.2","format":"markdown"},"payout":329.206,"replies":[],"created":"2021-03-20T03:43:45","community":"hive-143575","percent_steem_dollars":10000,"author_role":"admin","permlink":"5fatpe","author":"oldstone","payout_at":"2021-03-27T03:43:45","author_payout_value":"0.000 SBD","is_paidout":false,"author_reputation":81.87,"url":"/hive-143575/@oldstone/5fatpe","active_votes":null,"blacklists":[],"title":"미국이 갑자기 북한 비핵화를 주장한 이유","post_id":89923234,"updated":"2021-03-20T03:43:45","category":"hive-143575","stats":{"hide":false,"gray":false,"total_votes":209,"flag_weight":0},"children":2},"huaren.news/20210320you":{"pending_payout_value":"171.714 SBD","curator_payout_value":"0.000 SBD","body":"\n近年来，伴随DeFi逐渐走向主流，其与CeFi的对比无可避免地被搬上台面。 \n\nDeFi指去中心化金融业务，CeFi与其相比是一个新词，代表集中式金融业务。二者的主要区别包括：交易所、监管体系、参与费用、构建基础、热度炒作。首先，当使用传统的加密货币交易所时，例如Binance、Coinbase或Kraken，用户将资金发送到交换中心，在内部账户中进行管理。虽然资金存在交易所，但它们不受用户保管，因此，如果交易所采取的安全措施失败，资金很容易受到威胁。正因为如此，集中性交易所成为无数攻击的目标。\n\nKYC作为对账户持有人的强化审查，是反洗钱用于预防腐败的制度基础，了解资金来源合法性。DeFi无需对账户持有人的强化审查，CeFi则有严格监管要求。此外，DeFi费用更便宜，门槛低且利润高。质押借贷操作没有什么难度，区块链网络也成为参与者提供更加透明的投资环境。而相较于DeFi，CeFi价格比较昂贵，还有中介费。而相较于构建基础，DeFi主要构建在区块链上，CeFi构建在旧的金融体系之上。\n\n最后就是市场热点炒作需要。币圈难逃概念炒作，当前市场可以炒作的热点中，DeFi最有市场潜力又有实际的应用落地，再加上金融本身是区块链最容易落地方向，所以自然而然炒热引发大家蜂拥而至，投机者也都多了。\n\n功能上，CeFi更适合复杂金融场景，通过人为和经验判断做出更好的信用和风险评估。在与法币、链下实物资产相关的金融服务中也更为灵活、流动性更好。而DeFi更适合简单的金融场景，如数字资产的质押借贷，在简单的模式下，DeFi使得这一过程更加高效从而降低成本。此外，DeFi将资产所有权全权交还给用户，但这也是把双刃剑，因为CeFi机构为用户保管资产的同时，也可以提供更友好的客户服务。\n\n# SBD","curator_payout_value":"0.000 SBD","body":" \n 最近美股上演了一场荒诞又热血的华尔街激战，引发狗狗币两日暴涨1200%。当金融市场散户和机构间的矛盾逐渐白热化，2021年会成为DeFi破局关键吗？\n\n在美股这一场大象和蚂蚁的激战中，华尔街巨头被上万散户撂翻，整个纳斯达克变成一股乱粥。华尔街巨头们自己搭建起来的自由市场，又亲手拆掉。多家券商限制交易提高保证金，开不了股票仓位的美国散户稍作休顿，转战币圈。狗狗币便是那个最新目标，于是1月底的时候，狗狗币两天暴涨1200%，可见金融市场散户和机构间的矛盾正在走向白热化阶段。\n\n当纳斯达克的市场自由面具被揭下，传统金融机构公信力下跌。民粹主义融入金融市场，投资者金融意识正在觉醒。2020年下半年起，流动性挖矿点燃DeFi热潮，各赛道优质项目相继迸发，以Uniswap，Sushiswap为代表的去中心化交易所，近日无论是链上数据还是币价都让人十分兴奋。根据OKlink链上数据显示，近期Uniswap总锁仓仍在高速增长。在币价方面，UNI达到22左右美金创历史新高，是去年年底的五倍左右，而坐在DEX第二把交椅的SUSHI也到达18美金。\n\n综上所述，DeFi未来的出路可总结为以下四点：第一，提升认知。DeFi 是区块链最典型的应用，通过学习和掌握DeFi能够深入理解区块链、数字资产和开放金融的思想、理论、方法和局限性，大大提升自身认知。要知道，这个时代，财富和社会地位的差距，主要是由于认知差距导致的，所以提升认知至关重要。\n\n第二，掌握新的理财技能。最近DeFi领域出现一些新鲜概念和操作，比如流动性挖矿，可以在本金基本安全情况下，通过给一些新项目做贡献获取较高收益。但这件事情其实门槛很高，至少比大多数人以为风险更高，陷阱更多。对于这方面高手来说，可以通过综合分析各项目的风险与机遇，串接组合，提高收益率或降低风险。而对于初学者，必须认真学习和实践，沉浸其中，才能有所收获。\n\n第三，体验乐趣。如果学懂DeFi，将率先享受到数字世界中的金融自由。在几十种、上百种 DeFi 项目当中畅游，发掘新的应用组合方式，获取超过他人的收益，这个过程本身就是一个大型探险游戏，充满乐趣且奖励是实实在在的数字资产。\n\n第四，把握创业良机。当前正处在DeFi创业的黄金机会窗口，有能力者完全可以把握时机。想当初，2018年Uniswap只是一个程序员的业余项目，第一版发布时，智能合约只有500行代码，如今已经成长为DeFi世界里的顶梁柱，估值可能达到100亿美元。\n\n# Jones 중령)이 도로우측\n제2대대(모튼 중령)이 좌측(남방)을 공격중\n\n제1대대는 봉암리 고지에 지휘소 설치\n봉암리는 20여가의 소촌락으로 대정리와 수백야드 떨어져 있었음\n\n북동방 400 야드 정도 되는 긴 능선 서단이 동서로 연하는 도로와 800야드 간격으로 평행하게 뻗어있고 적이 이 능선을 점령\n\n8월 10일 제5연대 전투단 제2대대가 봉암리 두개 능선 남부를 장악\n제1대대의 B,C 중대는 북방능선의 동부를 담당\n나머지 능선은 적이 차지, 여기서 도로 쟁탈전이 전개\n\n#### 포병의 배치와 북한군의 공격\n\n연대를 지원하기 위해 미제555포병대대가 도착\nA포대는 봉암리 콩크리트 다리밑에 진지를 점령\nB포대는 촌락 외부 하천 뚝\n본부포대는 부락에 위치\n모든 포는 주도로 북방에 위치\n미5연대 전투단 본부와 555야포대대 C포대만 후방에 위치\n\n8월 10일 밤 봉암리 제1대대와 야포진지에 대한 적의 공격이 아침까지 계속\n555 야포대대장(John P. Roelofs)을 임명\n\n연대장은 봉암리 서방도로의 북쪽 능선의 적을 소탕하고 도로를 확보할 것이며 전투단이 완전히 철수할 때까지 그곳을 확보하라고 지시\n\n주공은 B중대 : 도로를 지배하는 우측산을 공격\nC 중대는 B중대와 연결하여 북방능선을 서방에서 공격\n야포를 위시한 모든 대대화기가 공격을 지원(야포사격이 효과적)\nB중대는 어둠이 가기 전에 목표고지를 점령\n\n전차 1개 분대의 증원을 받은 A중대 1개 소대는 봉암리 북방 포진지를 보호하기 위해 배치\nA중대(-)는 남방능선의 2대대가 21:00에 철수하자 2대대와 자리 교대\n\n대대의 공격은 성공적이었음","community_title":"KWH 한국전쟁사","max_accepted_payout":"1000000.000 SBD","beneficiaries":[],"depth":0,"promoted":"0.000 SBD","author_title":"","net_rshares":315513768555217,"json_metadata":{"tags":["kwh","usa-record"],"app":"steemit/0.2","format":"markdown"},"payout":345.922,"replies":[],"created":"2021-03-19T22:51:24","community":"hive-115078","percent_steem_dollars":10000,"author_role":"admin","permlink":"16-4-1","author":"wisdomandjustice","payout_at":"2021-03-26T22:51:24","author_payout_value":"0.000 SBD","is_paidout":false,"author_reputation":81.27,"url":"/hive-115078/@wisdomandjustice/16-4-1","active_votes":null,"blacklists":[],"title":"낙동강부터 압록강까지 16-4-1 피의 협곡과 포병의 무덤(비극의 서곡)","post_id":89920156,"updated":"2021-03-19T22:51:54","category":"hive-115078","stats":{"hide":false,"gray":false,"total_votes":150,"flag_weight":0},"children":1},"rishabh99946/updated-as-on-16th-march-or-compilation-of-on-going-contests-on-steem":{"pending_payout_value":"40.557 SBD","curator_payout_value":"0.000 SBD","body":"&lt;div class=\"text-justify\"&gt;\n\n\nSteem blockchain these days has a contest for everyone, find the right one for you participate and win STEEM rewards. creates communities where users are rewarded for sharing their voice. It's a new kind of attention economy.&lt;/strong&gt;\n\n&lt;strong&gt;To help make your experience more enjoyable, we made a list of useful tips, links, and fun games to play on the Steem Blockchain.&lt;/strong&gt;\n\n&lt;strong&gt;And thanks @steemingcurators and @cryptokannon for making the original post, you can also follow them to learn more details about Steemit.&lt;/strong&gt;\n\n&lt;strong&gt;This post is just a starting point, feel free to share suggestions in the comments, as we will continually improve this guide. &lt;/strong&gt;\n\n\n---\n---\n\nhttps://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUG73aG2MqaG3Vm4yHe6DYSejybkqnKeMortduZAAnBaX/%E6%96%B0%E6%89%8B%E5%BC%95%E5%AF%BC%E6%B5%B7%E6%8A%A5.png\n\n## This Guide will cover the following topics...\n1. The first thing to do when you come to Steemit\n2. Introduction of a Steemit Post\n3. Importance of the five given keys\n4. How to set your own profile\n5. The three ‘tokens’ on Steemit - SBD, STEEM and Steem Power\n6. Steem Power (SP) delegation\n7. How to earn STEEM\n8. How to post\n9. How to put tags on your post\n10. How many times can you post\n11. How to get more Steem Power (SP)\n12. Communities to join\n13. Useful tools\n14. Discord servers\n\n### The first thing to do when you come to Steemit &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;\nWhat is the very first thing a new Steemian should do? Post your first comment? Read the top paid posts to learn how to earn rewards? Upload your profile photo? The answer is, none of the above! The very first thing is: write down your master/owner keys on a piece of paper, and keep the paper in a safe, secure place. \nAnyone can use your password to log in, to transfer money, to comment on others, and fish your friends. What would you call it? 'Master/owner key' is not enough. We would call this long string 'Steem ID's Life'. If stolen, dead.\nWe warn every new Steemian: NEVER, EVER use your master/owner key when logging in to Steemit! ALWAYS login with your posting key. It is sufficient for everyday use.\nIf you are doing something related to your Steem Wallet, then use the active key.\nWhen do you use your master/owner key? Only when you want to recover something. Take it as the 'restore to factory settings' option on your smartphone. \n\n![yiQxDeZLZimXa0QrS2AMCNWqNR2R0P4vFMSkZ0JXT3eaSKaukqFAUyC7SpZ2kZBF-SPBP_PEiMl69t5BEclcteNF6q1ohREbXUo_BqTpccAOHFY6UMbbGfbmodjc1FzSG4j6mf0q.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWhMDQ2TymS4Krr394VZeKo1YWSJosGrvTaCNtzFsmBqW/yiQxDeZLZimXa0QrS2AMCNWqNR2R0P4vFMSkZ0JXT3eaSKaukqFAUyC7SpZ2kZBF-SPBP_PEiMl69t5BEclcteNF6q1ohREbXUo_BqTpccAOHFY6UMbbGfbmodjc1FzSG4j6mf0q.png)\n\n\n### Introduction of a Steemit Post &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;\n\nWhen you come to Steemit, you will see a lot of posts, but what are those buttons used for? Let’s see.\n\n![unnamed.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNyZJKcySMqbERtmdnQb9S7aLMV9pu4GsWDGG3otvP6SS/unnamed.png)\n\n### Importance of the five given keys  &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;\n\nYou'll be given a set of five passwords/keys uniquely generated for you. Keep these keys safe and secure. Each key is designed for different purposes, if you want to learn more detail about these keys, check out these posts:\n[How can I keep my steem account secure](https://steemitwallet.com/faq.html#How_can_I_keep_my_Steem_account_secure )\n[Steem Basics: Understanding Private Keys](https://steemit.com/steem/@steemitblog/steem-basics-understanding-private-keys-part-1)\n[Steem Key Management](https://www.steem.center/index.php?title=Steem_Key_Management)\n[What are all these keys in my wallet? Why so many?](https://steemit.com/steem-help/@sykochica/answering-common-questions-what-are-all-these-keys-in-my-wallet-why-so-many)\n\n### How to set your own profile? &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;\n\nYour profile info, profile image, and cover image can be set in your settings page. A complete profile is more appealing and will get more engagement. Once your image is uploaded, click the update button and enter your active key.\nThis is a really great post telling us how to set up profile, check it at: [How to setup a complete profile on your blog page.](https://steemit.com/hive-139293/@focusnow/how-to-setup-a-complete-profile-on-your-blog-page-tutorial-for-newbies-with-illustrations )\n\n### The Three Tokens on Steem&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;\nThere are 3 'tokens' on the Steem blockchain: STEEM, SBD (Steem Dollars), and Steem Power (SP)\n\n* **STEEM**\nSTEEM is the basic cryptocurrency of the Steem blockchain. You can earn it by posting, commenting or upvoting on Steemit.com. You can also deposit, withdraw or trade STEEM at any time. \n\n* **STEEM POWER (SP)**\nSTEEM can be powered up (or ‘staked’) as Steem Power (SP). The more Steem Power you have, the greater your influence on the platform. Having more Steem Power gives you more voting power, which allows you to earn more ‘curation rewards.  Having Steem Power also gives you the power to vote for the witnesses who oversee the blockchain.\nSteem Power can be converted back to STEEM through the process of ‘powering down’. This takes four weeks and you get a quarter of your Steem Power as liquid STEEM each week.\n* **SBD (Steem Dollars)**\nSBD was originally designed to be on parity with the US dollar - so 1 SBD should equal 1 US dollar.  However its value does fluctuate with the market although not as much as the value of STEEM, and it generally stays within about 10% of the dollar value.\n\n### Steem Power Delegation&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; \nSteem Power can be leant to other people through a process known as Delegation.\nWhen you delegate SP you retain the ownership of the Steem Power, but the person you have delegated it to enjoys the benefits of its voting power and collects the curation rewards from its use.\nSP is very important. Daily posting or direct buying can increase your SP. So, when you want to get more SP quickly, is there any way? The answer is delegating SP, which means lending your SP to others. \n\nPeople wonder if  the SP they delegate to others is safe? The answer is YES. When you delegate SP to someone else, they only have the right to use the SP, but the SP still remains in your wallet that can be withdrawn at any time (process usually takes 5 days). After you delegate the SP, there will be a parenthesis after the SP in your wallet interface, for example, the interface of someone’s wallet shows -2552.794STEEM, which means that the user has delegated more than 2500 SP to others.\n\n![1oVgubBHqvOer5SQTzhdcnRU1bTe9x2ECRE7Kr_-U8I6bVJx3qO1fvKWcM6HjWbSW7k29MU4svQC0NRV2jg_-A7IyE-D3Q-3nMciMNoQBlcYg4uTUuwZ262IUCf0V3-ZMB0Pva4R.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYvAcRH61j8EKMzU1eRHBXijQMgto27x3S4Qv6KqbgUUc/1oVgubBHqvOer5SQTzhdcnRU1bTe9x2ECRE7Kr_-U8I6bVJx3qO1fvKWcM6HjWbSW7k29MU4svQC0NRV2jg_-A7IyE-D3Q-3nMciMNoQBlcYg4uTUuwZ262IUCf0V3-ZMB0Pva4R.png)\n\nLearn more: https://steemit.com/hive-139293/@steemingcurators/how-to-delegate-your-steem-power\n\n### How to earn STEEM &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;\nThere are several ways you can earn STEEM, here are some options:\n- **Content creator**\nCreate interesting and valuable content on Steemit to earn STEEM as a content creator\n- **Freelance work**\nNetworking with a community member on steemit and share your passion or specialized skills that you can offer to the community as paid services or market your product.\n- **Take part in Contests and Challenges**\nSteemitblog and many other communities regularly run contests for every Steemian to join, if you win and upvote by official steem curation accounts or some other big whales, you will earn rewards by posting.\n- **Lease/Renting out your Steem Power**\nBuy some STEEM from exchanges and power up your STEEM to Steem Power then rent/lease it out to other Steemit users for daily Steem payment to your wallet.\nYou can buy STEEM from crypto exchanges. Here is a list of the most popular exchanges:\n- [Poloniex](https://poloniex.com)\n- [Binance](https://www.binance.com)\n- [Bittrex](https://global.bittrex.com/)\n- [Huobi](https://www.huobi.com)\n\n### How to post?  &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;\n1. It’s easy to post on Steemit, just click the button in the upper right corner to begin a post.  It is important to know how to format your Steemit posts like a pro, here is a guide from @cmp2020 on how to do that properly: [Markdown and HTML for Steemit Posts](https://steemit.com/steem/@cmp2020/a-beginner-s-guide-to-formatting-on-the-steem-blockchain-in-markdown-html)\n2. What does the Rewards: 50% SBD / 50% SP mean?\n\n![NQjXRxBJHFtRdLio03lv1MJkB75joXGWkjTKWl2aBka7HubZFTAAjfjtlu1COeeyi4moBHI_jvNoTbxI6c8dR9lqHVDvoqBc9YR4ZJcX29Pao4zA6_INIkEHKKDjTx7XFNYp_CRK.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRABTnbBDPKKMbbMkSEmrmBJBr4zw9xUu3NpCbnXakMm8/NQjXRxBJHFtRdLio03lv1MJkB75joXGWkjTKWl2aBka7HubZFTAAjfjtlu1COeeyi4moBHI_jvNoTbxI6c8dR9lqHVDvoqBc9YR4ZJcX29Pao4zA6_INIkEHKKDjTx7XFNYp_CRK.png)\n\nYou can learn from [Should I use 100% Steem Power or 50%/50% Payouts for my Post](https://steemit.com/steem-help/@sykochica/answering-common-questions-should-i-use-100-steem-power-or-50-50-payouts-for-my-post)\n\nAll rewards will be issued 7 days after publication. Click the small inverted triangle on the right side of the article's profit, it will display the article's potential profit and how long it is still going to be released.\n\n![11.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUJVG4gcrGXN8RtLmD643SbW7fPRCBGk1nP9YC8JQm7cQ/11.png)\n\n### How to put tags on your post? &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;\nUp to 5 tags can be added on each post, the tags of the article must be related to the subject. If you put a tag that does not match the subject, Steemit big whales will come to downvote it, which will have a great negative impact on the author’s reputation and profit.\n\nHere is a very good post that tells you how to use tags. \n[How to put TAGs on your Steemit Post](https://steemit.com/hive-172186/@cryptokannon/how-to-put-tags-on-your-steemit-post)\n\n\nOther popular tags you can find from looking through all trending posts and begin to use your interested tags to let more people find you.\n\n### How many times can you post? &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;\nThe more resource credits (SP) you have in your account, the more transactions you can perform. We recommend having at least 20SP to perform a normal usage. This is equivalent to 2 posts a day and several comments and upvotes. When you power up, you will have more SP instantly. To know exactly the status of your account, we \nrecommend using this free tool: [Steemworld](https://steemworld.org) (by @steemchiller)\nFor new Steemians, Steem will offer 15SP to begin posting.\n\n### How to get more STEEM POWER &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;\nSteem Power is the holy grail on Steem. The more you have, the more influence you have on the platform. So we recommend to POWER UP your STEEM in your Wallet.\n- Liquid STEEM in your wallet earns you nothing, which you can trade at an exchange for other crypto or sell for fiat currency. When you power up STEEM, part of the new generated Steem will be distributed to all users who are holding SP, you don´t have to do anything, it increases automatically.\n- When you upvote a post with your SP, you earn curation rewards, this is a portion of the total payout of the post you voted on. Authors get 50%, curators get 50%. The more SP you have, the more curation rewards you earn because your vote is bigger.\n- Compete in challenges on Steemit. Monthly, there is a contest called #spud4steem, on this day you get extra motivated to POWER UP, because you can earn SP and other prizes! Follow @kiwiscanfly\n- POWER UP Steem to Steem Power (SP), the conversion ratio is 1:1, which is instant. But if you POWER DOWN Steem Power (SP) to STEEM it takes 4 weeks, please be cautious when doing this.\n\n### Communities to join &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;\n\nYou can check [HERE](https://steemit.com/communities) to see all the communities on Steemit and subscribe the one you interested in.\n\n### Useful tools&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; \n- https://steemworld.org is a very useful website to check everything regarding your account or transactions on the Steem Blockchain. Just put /@yourusername at the end of the link! Made by top witness @steemchiller.\n- If you post and want to include an image that is not yours, you can use photos from the following websites that are free to use. Please add the link to the image source in your post.\n~ https://shutterstock.com\n~ https://pexels.com\n~ https://unsplash.com\n\n- For users that don't post in their own language or want to improve grammar and spelling of your post, we recommend using [Grammarly](https://grammarly.com/), it is free and also has a [Chrome extension](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/grammarly-for-chrome/kbfnbcaeplbcioakkpcpgfkobkghlhen?hl=en). When your posts are enjoyable to read, more people will follow you and give you support!\n\n- Steemit is the biggest application on the Steem blockchain if you want to discover what else Steem has to offer, [Dappradar](https://www.stateofthedapps.com/rankings/platform/steem) lists them all. You can use the same keys for every Dapp on Steem!\n\n### Discord Servers.\n- SteemGlobal :  https://discord.gg/pqmDxNR\n- The Steeming Curator :https://discord.gg/S8gJ6bG \n\nThank you and STEEM ON!---\n---\n---\nIf you have any suggestions, please put your comment under this post, we will follow it ASAP. Guidelines&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;\n\nWe are keen to ensure that all contributions to the Steemit Crypto Academy are of as high a standard as possible.\n\nWhile the Crypto Professors may set specific requirements for some of their homework tasks we would suggest all students follow these basic guidelines…\n\n* Title the post with the format - **Crypto Academy Week 6 - Homework Post for [name of Crypto Professor] …**\n* Homework posts should be at least 300 words \n* All work should be your own - **plagiarism will not be tolerated**\n* Any graphs, screenshots, quotes etc used from other sources should be fully referenced\n* Any images used should be from copyright-free sources and fully referenced\n* Homework posts should include the tag #cryptoacademy and any tag specifically required by the Crypto Professor in the first five tags. collaboration","special":true,"post_id":84406447,"updated":"2020-02-15T04:14:48","category":"steem","stats":{"hide":false,"gray":false,"total_votes":2863,"flag_weight":4},"children":614}],"promoted_posts":[],"notices":[{"pending_payout_value":"0.000 SBD","curator_payout_value":"30.988 SBD","body":"Hello Steemians, today we’d like to tell you about an improvement we’re making to the ICO featureset of SMTs. As you may have heard, we recently unveiled our SMT wizard at Steem Fest 4. \n\n![IMG_1563.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQme6pLKUWALWGLGJNgtTjZwhUuoM5CVG4xQoecX7B2QJAD/IMG_1563.JPG)\n*@gerbino left, @vandeberg right*\n\nThe SMT wizard will make it easy for anyone, not just developers, to launch their own full-fledged cryptocurrency with 3-second fee-less transfers and powerful features like Proof-of-Brain. In that demonstration @vandeberg and @gerbino created 3 cryptocurrencies on the Steem testnet in under 10 minutes! One of those demonstrations was what they called a “Binance-style” launch.\n\n&lt;h1&gt;The “Binance Style” Launch&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nSMTs have the ability to set a “Soft Cap” which is basically a fundraising goal that does not result in the termination of the ICO. This differs from a “Hard Cap” in that it is a fundraising goal that *does* result in the termination of the ICO. With a Soft Cap in place, the SMT creator can distribute different incentives based on whether a user contributed to the ICO prior to, or subsequent to, the Soft Cap. \n\nThe Binance-Style ICO was intended to highlight these options. There was only one problem; Binance’s ICO featured two Soft Caps meaning that it had 3 tiers of incentives. \n\n&lt;h1&gt;Guiding Principle: Maximum Flexibility&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nWhen determining what features to add to SMTs we asked ourselves what features would effectively give developers the “most bang for the buck.” We then ask whether we can abstract the parameters of the feature so as to maximize its flexibility. For example, SMTs can have a token inflation rate. But we don’t limit developers to just one token emissions rate that we judge to be “ideal,” we enable them to configure their token emissions rate based on whatever “graph” they want. \n\nIf you can describe how you want your token emissions rate to change over time in a mathematical formula, you can specify that formula when you are creating your SMT and the Steem blockchain will faithfully execute that code. For an incremental increase in the amount of work required, we unleash practically unlimited flexibility.\n\n&lt;h1&gt;*N* Tier ICOs&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nWith respect to the Soft Cap, we realized that the work required to go from 2 tiers, to *N* (meaning any positive integer) tiers was relatively trivial in comparison to the degree of flexibility it opens up to developers. In addition, while the improvement would (and did) only take a few days of work at this stage in development, adding this functionality after the release of SMTv1 would have presented significant challenges. \n\nThat being said, truly allowing for N tiers would create some maintenance challenges, so we decided to cap the number of potential tiers to 10. The benefit of this approach is that going from 10 tiers to N tiers at a later date would be easy. \n\n&lt;h1&gt;Surgical Strike&lt;/h1&gt;\n\n Because the ICO tiers are used during contributor and founder payouts only, we were able to make this change like a “surgical strike.\" We were able to add this data structure and operation (which is trivial) while only having to modify the payout mechanisms. We then modified the tests designed to check the internal data structures that are being changed. \n\nThis work is now mostly complete and will go live on the testnet shortly!\n\nIf you haven’t already, please check out our demo of the SMT Wizard at Steem Fest 4 to learn more about SMTs.\n\nhttps://youtu.be/2gtAPNFd4NA?t=3643\n\n[Happy thanksgiving!](https://steemit.com/steemit/@steemitblog/happy-thanksgiving)\n\n_The Steemit Blockchain Team_","max_accepted_payout":"1000000.000 SBD","curator_payout_value":"49.357 SBD","body":"Hello Steemians! The Steemit Team (#newsteemit) had a great time at Steemfest and we’re now all back to work pushing forward on Communities and SMTs. For those of you who didn’t watch the livestreams (shame on you!) we’d like to update you on some of the exciting developments that we covered at SteemFest.\n\n![Screen Shot 2019-11-21 at 12.22.33 PM.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTRYuHUx6PJMZcdZkuzUtPpUn7WZNWiz48J1mUu99Diiy/Screen%20Shot%202019-11-21%20at%2012.22.33%20PM.png)\n\n&lt;h1&gt;Group Presentation&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nWe kicked things off with a group presentation during which every project lead spent about 10 minutes going over what we've accomplished over the past year, what we're working on now, and our visions for the future of Steem.\n\nhttps://youtu.be/4CNSMDEsAXU?t=963\n\n&lt;h1&gt;Communities&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nIn his Steemfest presentation, @roadscape explored his vision for the future of steemit.com. In his view, having the most powerful blockchain isn’t going to get you very far if people can’t *see* what it is capable of doing. While some may think that the problem is not enough blockchain-level features, that we need more marketing, or easier sign ups, it all boils down to *engagement.* \n\n@roadscape believes that Communities has the potential to address all of these core issues, but that’s a lot of pressure to put on just one application! So while designing Communities he asked himself questions like, “What does a healthy platform look like?” “What does a moderation system which serves its users look like?” “How do you shift Steem from a game people play to a way they interact with the world?” And of course, “What is a Community?” \n\nHe answers all those questions and more in the following video and then wraps things up with a surprise announcement and demo of Communities ***which are now in Private Beta!***\n\nhttps://youtu.be/Cy6OrblBEc0?t=2131\n\n&lt;h1&gt;SMT Wizard&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nIn their blockchain presentation, @vandeberg and @gerbino gave a surprise demonstration of the SMT Wizard they’ve developed which will enable anyone, not just developers, to launch their very own SMT in minutes! The wizard is still in development, so it will continue to get better over time, and we plan to release it to the public in the not-to-distant future. \n\nIn the following video, they launch not one, but three SMTs in under 15 minutes *while explaining what they are doing.* These are actual Smart Media Tokens that were created on the testnet! \n\nhttps://youtu.be/2gtAPNFd4NA?t=3643\n\nSteemfest was an amazing experience for the team and we can’t thank @roelandp enough for all the time and energy he puts into making these conferences as fun and informative as possible. There is no other conference in the world like Steemfest and that is due in large part to his herculean efforts. \n\nOf course, it also wouldn’t be Steemfest if not for the amazing community members who assist Roeland (shout out to the @firepower team) as well as attend the conference. Thank you all for sticking with us through the difficult times.\n\nWe can’t wait till next year! \n\n_The Steemit Team_","max_accepted_payout":"1000000.000 Announcements","post_id":81949977,"updated":"2019-11-22T18:45:30","category":"steemfest","stats":{"hide":false,"gray":false,"total_votes":1134,"flag_weight":0},"children":139},{"pending_payout_value":"0.000 SBD","curator_payout_value":"51.799 SBD","body":"![SMT features ICO.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcia1kVeRaWL5RReMsQyR44fS5v21nQ96rqy3bMx2Y9SR/SMT%20features%20ICO.jpg)\n\nThe most unique, and potentially disruptive, feature of SMTs is the ability for anyone to launch a powerful cryptocurrency with industry leading features, without having to write a single line of code. \n\n&lt;h1&gt;ICOs&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nPotentially as disruptive, however, is the unique value proposition that SMTs will offer with respect to ICOs (Initial Coin Offerings). With any other token launching protocol, it is the developers of the cryptocurrency who are ultimately responsible for airdropping the cryptocurrency to the people who contribute to the ICO.\n\n&lt;h3&gt;Minimizing Risk&lt;/h3&gt;\n\nThis creates two risks to the stakeholder. The first is the risk that the smart contracts will have a bug. At Steemit, we believe the idiom \"All code is buggy,\" and this belief continually shapes our development practices and priorities. Therefore, the risk that the smart contracts will have a bug is significant. The second risk is that the airdrop will not be faithfully executed. In other words, there is generally an element of trust.\n\n&lt;h3&gt;Decentralized Airdrops&lt;/h3&gt;\n\nWith SMTs you get the reliability and security of Steem, and decentralized execution of the ICO parameters. Once the creator of an SMT finalizes the traits of their token, including how the ICO will proceed, they give up all control over the token launch and distribution process, and hand over control to the Steem blockchain which faithfully executes the airdrop. \n\nIn short, SMTs are not distributed by an organization that you need to trust, they are distributed by a decentralized blockchain protocol that has been in operation for over 3 years: Steem.\n\n&lt;h1&gt;Highly Customizable&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nJust because you don’t need to write code in order to launch an SMT doesn’t mean they aren’t a highly technical product. As you will see, there are a lot of “knobs” that an SMT creator can turn, which results in nearly infinite customizability. In this post we’ll talk about just a few of these knobs and the potential value they offer to those considering launching a cryptocurrency.\n\n&lt;h3&gt;Minimum STEEM Contribution&lt;/h3&gt;\n\nYou can think of the ICO process as having 3 stages, each of which should be designed to incentivize contributors to reach the next stage. The first stage is delineated by the “Minimum STEEM Contribution.” If this parameter is set to 100,000 STEEM but only 99,000 STEEM is contributed, then the ICO will not be executed and all of those funds will be automatically returned to the contributors. This protects contributors in the event an ICO fails to reach its goals. \n\n&lt;h3&gt;Contribution Soft Cap&lt;/h3&gt;\n\nThe next major stage is delineated by the “Contribution Soft Cap.” You can think of this as a “safety cap.” It might be a goal you believe you are likely to achieve, but not the highest contribution goal you’re hoping to get. In order to maximize the odds that the SMT creator can reach this goal, they are able to set “Pre Soft Cap” and “Post Soft Cap” token distribution parameters. They are able to specify how many tokens they want to distribute to a contributor based on how much STEEM they have contributed before the soft cap is reached, and a different distribution for after the soft cap is reached. \n\nFor example, an SMT creator could choose to distribute 5 of their SMT for every 1 STEEM that is contributed by a given account prior to the Soft Cap being reached. The SMT creator could also choose to set the “Post Soft Cap” token distribution parameters such that 2.5 of their SMT is distributed to an account for every 1 STEEM it contributed to the ICO. In other words, the account that contributed prior to the Soft Cap got a 100% bonus.\n\n&lt;h3&gt;Contribution Hard Cap&lt;/h3&gt;\n\nBut an SMT creator might still want to create some scarcity around their token so that those who contribute after the Soft Cap still feel like they got a “deal.” That’s where the Hard Cap comes in. It acts as a ceiling on the total amount of an SMT that accounts can receive in return for contributions. Once the Hard Cap is reached it will become *impossible* for more contributions to made. Even if the creator of the SMT wanted to increase the Hard Cap they couldn’t because all of the parameters are “locked” in consensus. \n\nIf the Hard Cap has been reached, anyone who wants the SMT must wait to purchase it from an existing token holder, or earn it through Proof-of-Brain, assuming the SMT creator decided to leverage those features. \n\n&lt;h1&gt;No Code?&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nJust because anyone will be able to launch an SMT without writing a line of code, that doesn’t mean they are underpowered or simple. SMTs are an enterprise-level product, and there are a lot of features that one must understand in order to take full advantage of the capabilities.\n\n&lt;h1&gt;More to Come&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nThe ICO features are just one example of the types of options developers and entrepreneurs will have at their disposal, and how a trustless implementation differentiates SMTs from other token launching protocols. \n\nWe will continue to release more information about the various features included in the SMT protocol, so be sure to follow @steemitblog or [subscribe to our e-mail newsletter](https://newsletters.steemit.com/subscription?f=LWp2TaHsbowEO2MHeUM4xWhbUFcJe63PcNAKV5aLMiKt7637Bd763OkiL1fFe6dlIBfUo0FCfd763z6EDts763FCYQGZJQ). We will also be talking about SMTs, and much more, next week at SteemFest! So be sure to tune in to the livestreams.\n\n_The Steemit Team_","max_accepted_payout":"1000000.000 SMTs","post_id":81300674,"updated":"2019-10-29T18:52:51","category":"smt","stats":{"hide":false,"gray":false,"total_votes":1264,"flag_weight":0},"children":130},{"pending_payout_value":"0.000 SBD","curator_payout_value":"43.011 SBD","body":"![SMT testnet live.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUXhPDz7WA8EzjnSWZrvyojxW5BHqTq2hxcNfpfKiK3QD/SMT%20testnet%20live.jpg)\n\nWe are excited to announce that the Smart Media Token (SMT) testnet is now live! \n\nYou can connect to the testnet by listing testnet.steemitdev.com:2001 as a seed node and by setting your chain id with option ```--chain-id=46d82ab7d8db682eb1959aed0ada039a6d49afa1602491f93dde9cac3e8e6c32```\n\n\n&lt;h1&gt;Entrepreneurs & Developers&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nThis is an especially exciting moment because it means that once the testnet hardforks in SMTs, developers and entrepreneurs will be able to begin playing with Smart Media Tokens in a test environment! This has been 2 years in the making, but the development phase of SMTs is finally complete, and testing has begun.\n\n&lt;h1&gt;Testing Philosophy&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nTesting SMTs is going to be a bit different than testing previous hardforks. The features being added are the most extensive feature set we have ever added to Steem. Most of the preexisting systems in Steem had to be extended to support SMTs. Due to the magnitude of this update, we are planning on an extended testing period to ensure we catch all critical bugs, catch as many minor issues as possible, and to give our developer community as much time as they need to integrate their applications with SMTs. \n\nIn the first month or two, we will be liberal with relaunching the testnet when bugs are caught and fixed. The first few of these testnets will have a hardfork date a few days after launch to test the hardfork block. When we feel comfortable with that code path, we will launch testnets with SMTs enabled.  Once we feel we have caught the low hanging fruit, we will leave the testnet up for an extended period to give developers some stability in their testing and development. \n\n&lt;h3&gt;Hardfork Date&lt;/h3&gt;\n\nWe are not announcing a hardfork date for SMTs because we want to allow for as much testing as needed to ensure a smooth launch for SMTs.\n\n&lt;h3&gt;Testing SMTs&lt;/h3&gt;\n\nSMTs have a number of customizable parameters which enable countless potential configurations. Once SMTs are enabled, and our client libraries updated, we strongly suggest that developers begin experimenting with these different options and testing them in their applications so that they can observe the impact on user behavior. Of course, these will not be “real” SMTs in the sense that none of them will be running on mainnet and all the information will be reset once the code is hardforked in.  \n\n&lt;h1&gt;Testnet v. Mainnet&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nSMTs on mainnet will be full-fledged cryptocurrencies with industry-leading features like 3-second fee-less transfers. But they will also feature *unrivaled* features like Proof-of-Brain which, if tuned properly, can be a powerful mechanism for bootstrapping token usage by turbocharging engagement. But bear in mind that once cryptocurrencies become tradeable and acquire real utility, the way that people interact with them changes and becomes highly unpredictable. \n\nThat is precisely why it is so important to test one’s SMT as thoroughly as possible before it is released, because like any cryptocurrency, once an SMT is released, its economic properties cannot be altered without a hardfork. \n\n&lt;h1&gt;#newsteem&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nThe added benefit of all this testing will be helping the Steem ecosystem by ensuring that these changes do not negatively impact the Steem blockchain. SMTs represent the single biggest change to the Steem blockchain since the original release! Steem will be changing from a platform for sharing and rewarding content, to a platform for releasing state-of-the-art cryptocurrencies that “just work.” \n\n&lt;h3&gt;Onboarding the Masses&lt;/h3&gt;\n\nWe have long said that our mission is to onboard the masses to the blockchain by tokenizing the web. After SMTs, every website and web application will be able to have their own powerful cryptocurrency customized to meet their own needs and maximize their own business and social objectives. \n\n***Steem will be the critical computational layer supporting all of these different tokens, while STEEM is the critical *financial* layer providing transferability, liquidity, and access to exchanges.***\n\nSo go forth and test the SMT hardfork! We’ll be presenting about SMTs at SteemFest, so if you’re going to be there, be sure to attend our presentations.\n\n_The Steemit Team_","max_accepted_payout":"1000000.000 open process for applying to be Featured on steemit.com. We want to bring as much positive attention to great projects and content creators as possible. To that end we have created the following framework which is intended to minimize the work required on your end, while ensuring that your content is optimized for being Featured on steemit.com and enjoying the maximum benefit from that position.\n\n&lt;h1&gt;TL;DR&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nFollow the format below and submit your copy at least 7 days prior to the day on which you would like to be Featured. \n\n&lt;center&gt;&lt;h1&gt;Format&lt;/h1&gt;&lt;/center&gt;\n\nFeatured posts should be short, sweet and to the point. They should have roughly 3 sections that each serve an important purpose.\n\n&lt;h3&gt;Section 1: The Steem Audience&lt;/h3&gt;\n\nThe whole point of featuring content on steemit.com is to maximize its impact for the Steem audience. That’s why we recommend starting off with a brief paragraph that explains why your offering (whether it’s a new feature, competition, incentive program, etc.) adds, or has already delivered, unique value to the Steem blockchain ecosystem and its users.\n\nE.g. “Thanks to this new feature, Steemians will enjoy an entirely new capability that increases their opportunities while decreasing their exposure to volatility.”\n\n&lt;h3&gt;Section 2: Your User Base&lt;/h3&gt;\n\nObviously your users are your #1 priority which is why we recommend that the second section in the post be dedicated to highlighting how Steem integration has added unique value for them. \n\n&lt;h3&gt;Section 3: Call-to-Action&lt;/h3&gt;\n\nThe final section should be your call-to-action where you encourage anyone consuming your content to perform an action which ultimately benefits your project, for example by visiting your website or promoting your project.\n\n&lt;h1&gt;Grammar and Syntax&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nFeatured posts are the most visible posts on all of steemit.com so we want to ensure that readers (for whom this might be their first exposure to steemit.com) are left with a positive impression of the site and its Featured content. For that reason, we request that your Featured post be reviewed for grammatical and syntactical errors before it is submitted for review.  \n\nWe know you’ve probably got all kinds of information you want to expose people to, so you should feel free to insert links and references to this content while remaining within this format.\n\n&lt;h1&gt;Application Process&lt;/h1&gt;\n\nOnce you have done all of the above, e-mail a copy of the article to andrarchy@steemit.com at least 1 week prior to the time you would like to be featured. Please bear in mind that conforming to this process is a prerequisite for being featured, not a guarantee.
